answers.answer: Most cats in the US are a bit overweight.  You must monitor your cats weight by using an accurate scale, even if it means taking your cat to the vet to have her weighed.  Russian blues can be lean, normally.  It would be best to  take your cat to the vet and having blood work performed to see if she may have hyperthyroid disease or diabetes.

question: Hi, i have a female russian blue cat that's about 3 years old. Lately, i've noticed that she is getting thin. I make sure she eats, drinks, gets her exercise, and uses the litter box. She has the energy of a regular cat, but yet she is thin. I have heard from people that russian blues are thin to begin with. Can you help me?
title: i need some help
